name: Elevator (itch)
description:
Elevator is a puzzle-game made for the xkcd-gamejam. It is based on https://xkcd.com/897/ .

You should play the game with sound!

Spoiler (only use if you are stuck): https://pastebin.com/9hckJa2E

Game: devsaur
Music: lost phases

Assets that weren't created during the jam:
Unreal Engine Starter Content (some materials)
